title: Io non ho paura (I'm Not Scared) [2003 PAL DVD][It Subs[Nordic]

Secrets. Betrayal. Murder. Who can you trust when everyone's a suspect?

Something sinister is lurking under the surface of 10-year old Michele's idyllic summer. While the days in his remote southern Italian village are filled with the familiar routines of childhood, a chance discovery leads to a shocking revelation. Now, suddenly beyond the point-of-no-return, Michele digs further to find that even his own parents may be involved in a monstrous crime...



Director Gabriele Salvatores
Certificate 15 years and over
Year 2003
